title: Generate Markdown Thumbnail
cap_description: Generate a thumbnail image preview of the markdown document

required.name: file_path
required.arg_description: Path to the markdown file to process

optional.name: width
optional.arg_description: Width of the thumbnail in pixels

optional.name: height
optional.arg_description: Height of the thumbnail in pixels

optional.name: output_file
optional.arg_description: Write thumbnail to specified file instead of stdout

output.output_description: PNG image data representing a thumbnail of the markdown document
